00042 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00043 |   NPT_StringFinder
00044 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00049 class NPT_StringFinder
00050 {
00051 public:
00052     // methods
00053     NPT_StringFinder(const char* value, bool ignore_case = false) : 
00054         m_Value(value), m_IgnoreCase(ignore_case) {}
00055     virtual ~NPT_StringFinder() {}
00056     bool operator()(const NPT_String* const & value) const {
00057         return value->Compare(m_Value, m_IgnoreCase) ? false : true;
00058     }
00059     bool operator()(const NPT_String& value) const {
00060         return value.Compare(m_Value, m_IgnoreCase) ? false : true;
00061     }
00062 
00063 private:
00064     // members
00065     NPT_String   m_Value;
00066     bool         m_IgnoreCase;
00067 };
00068 
00069 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00070 |   PLT_UPnPMessageHelper class
00071 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00076 class PLT_UPnPMessageHelper
00077 {
00078 public:
00079     // methods
00080     static const NPT_String* GetST(const NPT_HttpMessage& message) { 
00081         return message.GetHeaders().GetHeaderValue("ST"); 
00082     }
00083     static NPT_Result SetST(NPT_HttpMessage& message, 
00084                             const char*      st) { 
00085         return message.GetHeaders().SetHeader("ST", st); 
00086     }
00087     static const NPT_String* GetNT(const NPT_HttpMessage& message) { 
00088         return message.GetHeaders().GetHeaderValue("NT"); 
00089     }
00090     static NPT_Result SetNT(NPT_HttpMessage& message, 
00091                             const char*      nt) { 
00092         return message.GetHeaders().SetHeader("NT", nt); 
00093     }
00094     static const NPT_String* GetNTS(const NPT_HttpMessage& message) { 
00095         return message.GetHeaders().GetHeaderValue("NTS"); 
00096     }
00097     static NPT_Result SetNTS(NPT_HttpMessage& message, 
00098                              const char*      nts) { 
00099         return message.GetHeaders().SetHeader("NTS", nts); 
00100     }
00101     static const NPT_String* GetMAN(const NPT_HttpMessage& message) { 
00102         return message.GetHeaders().GetHeaderValue("MAN"); 
00103     }
00104     static NPT_Result SetMAN(NPT_HttpMessage& message, 
00105                              const char*      man) { 
00106         return message.GetHeaders().SetHeader("MAN", man); 
00107     }
00108     static const NPT_String* GetLocation(const NPT_HttpMessage& message) { 
00109         return message.GetHeaders().GetHeaderValue("Location"); 
00110     }
00111     static NPT_Result SetLocation(NPT_HttpMessage& message, 
00112                                   const char*      location) { 
00113         return message.GetHeaders().SetHeader("Location", location); 
00114     }
00115     static const NPT_String* GetServer(const NPT_HttpMessage& message) { 
00116         return message.GetHeaders().GetHeaderValue(NPT_HTTP_HEADER_SERVER); 
00117     }
00118     static NPT_Result SetServer(NPT_HttpMessage& message, 
00119                                 const char*      server, 
00120                                 bool             replace = true) { 
00121         return message.GetHeaders().SetHeader(
00122             NPT_HTTP_HEADER_SERVER, 
00123             server, 
00124             replace); 
00125     }
00126     static const NPT_String* GetUSN(const NPT_HttpMessage& message) { 
00127         return message.GetHeaders().GetHeaderValue("USN"); 
00128     }
00129     static NPT_Result SetUSN(NPT_HttpMessage& message, 
00130                              const char*      usn) { 
00131         return message.GetHeaders().SetHeader("USN", usn); 
00132     }
00133     static const NPT_String* GetCallbacks(const NPT_HttpMessage& message) { 
00134         return message.GetHeaders().GetHeaderValue("CALLBACK"); 
00135     }
00136     static NPT_Result SetCallbacks(NPT_HttpMessage& message, 
00137                                    const char*      callbacks) { 
00138         return message.GetHeaders().SetHeader("CALLBACK", callbacks); 
00139     }
00140     static const NPT_String* GetSID(const NPT_HttpMessage& message) { 
00141         return message.GetHeaders().GetHeaderValue("SID"); 
00142     }
00143     static NPT_Result SetSID(NPT_HttpMessage& message, 
00144                              const char*      sid) { 
00145         return message.GetHeaders().SetHeader("SID", sid); 
00146     }
00147     static NPT_Result GetLeaseTime(const NPT_HttpMessage& message, 
00148                                    NPT_TimeInterval&      lease) { 
00149         const NPT_String* cc = 
00150             message.GetHeaders().GetHeaderValue("Cache-Control");
00151         NPT_CHECK_POINTER(cc);
00152         return ExtractLeaseTime(*cc, lease);
00153     }
00154     static NPT_Result SetLeaseTime(NPT_HttpMessage&        message, 
00155                                    const NPT_TimeInterval& lease) { 
00156         return message.GetHeaders().SetHeader(
00157             "Cache-Control", 
00158             "max-age="+NPT_String::FromInteger(lease.ToSeconds())); 
00159     }
00160     static NPT_Result GetTimeOut(const NPT_HttpMessage& message, 
00161                                  NPT_Int32&             seconds) { 
00162         seconds = 0;
00163         const NPT_String* timeout = 
00164             message.GetHeaders().GetHeaderValue("TIMEOUT"); 
00165         NPT_CHECK_POINTER(timeout);
00166         return ExtractTimeOut(*timeout, seconds); 
00167     }
00168     static NPT_Result SetTimeOut(NPT_HttpMessage& message, 
00169                                  const NPT_Int32  seconds) { 
00170         if (seconds >= 0) {
00171             return message.GetHeaders().SetHeader(
00172                 "TIMEOUT", 
00173                 "Second-"+NPT_String::FromInteger(seconds)); 
00174         } else {
00175             return message.GetHeaders().SetHeader(
00176                 "TIMEOUT", 
00177                 "Second-infinite"); 
00178         }
00179     }
00180     static NPT_Result GetIfModifiedSince(const NPT_HttpMessage& message,
00181                                          NPT_DateTime&          date) {
00182         
00183         const NPT_String* value = 
00184             message.GetHeaders().GetHeaderValue("If-Modified-Since");
00185         NPT_CHECK_POINTER(value);
00186         // Try RFC 1123, RFC 1036, then ANSI
00187         if (NPT_SUCCEEDED(date.FromString(*value, NPT_DateTime::FORMAT_RFC_1123))) 
00188             return NPT_SUCCESS;
00189         if (NPT_SUCCEEDED(date.FromString(*value, NPT_DateTime::FORMAT_RFC_1036)))
00190             return NPT_SUCCESS;
00191         return date.FromString(*value, NPT_DateTime::FORMAT_ANSI);
00192     }            
00193     static NPT_Result SetIfModifiedSince(NPT_HttpMessage&    message,
00194                                          const NPT_DateTime& date) {
00195         return message.GetHeaders().SetHeader(
00196             "If-Modified-Since",
00197             date.ToString(NPT_DateTime::FORMAT_RFC_1123));
00198     }
00199     static NPT_Result GetMX(const NPT_HttpMessage& message, 
00200                             NPT_UInt32&            value) { 
00201         value = 0;
00202         const NPT_String* mx = 
00203             message.GetHeaders().GetHeaderValue("MX");
00204         NPT_CHECK_POINTER(mx);
00205         return NPT_ParseInteger32(*mx, value);
00206     }
00207     static NPT_Result SetMX(NPT_HttpMessage& message, 
00208                             const NPT_UInt32 mx) {
00209         return message.GetHeaders().SetHeader(
00210             "MX", 
00211             NPT_String::FromInteger(mx)); 
00212     }
00213     static NPT_Result GetSeq(const NPT_HttpMessage& message,  
00214                              NPT_UInt32&      value) { 
00215         value = 0;
00216         const NPT_String* seq = 
00217             message.GetHeaders().GetHeaderValue("SEQ");
00218         NPT_CHECK_POINTER(seq);
00219         return NPT_ParseInteger32(*seq, value);
00220     }
00221     static NPT_Result SetSeq(NPT_HttpMessage& message, 
00222                              const NPT_UInt32 seq) {
00223         return message.GetHeaders().SetHeader(
00224             "SEQ", 
00225             NPT_String::FromInteger(seq)); 
00226     }
00227     static const char* GenerateUUID(int         count, 
00228                                     NPT_String& uuid) {   
00229         uuid = "";
00230         for (int i=0;i<(count<100?count:100);i++) {
00231             int random = NPT_System::GetRandomInteger();
00232             uuid += (char)((random % 25) + 66);
00233         }
00234         return uuid;
00235     }
00236     static const char* GenerateGUID(NPT_String& guid) {   
00237         guid = "";
00238         for (int i=0;i<32;i++) {
00239             char nibble = (char)(NPT_System::GetRandomInteger() % 16);
00240             guid += (nibble < 10) ? ('0' + nibble) : ('a' + (nibble-10));
00241             if (i == 7 || i == 11 || i == 15 || i == 19) {
00242                 guid += '-';
00243             }
00244         }
00245         return guid;
00246     }
00247     static NPT_Result ExtractLeaseTime(const NPT_String& cache_control, 
00248                                        NPT_TimeInterval& lease) {
00249         NPT_Int32 value;
00250         if (cache_control.StartsWith("max-age=", true) &&
00251             NPT_SUCCEEDED(NPT_ParseInteger32(cache_control.GetChars()+8, 
00252                                              value))) {
00253             lease.SetSeconds(value);
00254             return NPT_SUCCESS;
00255         }
00256         return NPT_FAILURE;
00257     }
00258     static NPT_Result ExtractTimeOut(const char* timeout, 
00259                                      NPT_Int32&  len) {
00260         NPT_String temp = timeout;
00261         if (temp.CompareN("Second-", 7, true)) {
00262             return NPT_ERROR_INVALID_FORMAT;
00263         }
00264 
00265         if (temp.Compare("Second-infinite", true) == 0) {
00266             len = NPT_TIMEOUT_INFINITE;
00267             return NPT_SUCCESS;
00268         }
00269         return temp.SubString(7).ToInteger(len);
00270     }
00271     static NPT_Result GetIPAddresses(NPT_List<NPT_IpAddress>& ips, 
00272                                      bool with_localhost = false) {
00273         NPT_List<NPT_NetworkInterface*> if_list;
00274         NPT_CHECK(GetNetworkInterfaces(if_list, with_localhost));
00275 
00276         NPT_List<NPT_NetworkInterface*>::Iterator iface = 
00277             if_list.GetFirstItem();
00278         while (iface) {
00279             NPT_IpAddress ip = 
00280                 (*(*iface)->GetAddresses().GetFirstItem()).GetPrimaryAddress();
00281             if (ip.ToString().Compare("0.0.0.0") && 
00282                 (with_localhost || ip.ToString().Compare("127.0.0.1"))) {
00283                 ips.Add(ip);
00284             }
00285             ++iface;
00286         }
00287 
00288         if (ips.GetItemCount() == 0 || with_localhost) {
00289             NPT_IpAddress localhost;
00290             localhost.Parse("127.0.0.1");
00291             ips.Add(localhost);
00292         }
00293 
00294         if_list.Apply(NPT_ObjectDeleter<NPT_NetworkInterface>());
00295         return NPT_SUCCESS;
00296     }
00297 
00298     static NPT_Result GetNetworkInterfaces(NPT_List<NPT_NetworkInterface*>& if_list, 
00299                                            bool with_localhost = false) {
00300         NPT_CHECK(_GetNetworkInterfaces(if_list, false));
00301 
00302         // if no valid interfaces or if requested, add localhost capable interface
00303         if (if_list.GetItemCount() == 0 || with_localhost) {
00304             NPT_CHECK(_GetNetworkInterfaces(if_list, true));
00305         }
00306         return NPT_SUCCESS;
00307     }
00308 
00309     static NPT_Result GetMACAddresses(NPT_List<NPT_String>& addresses) {
00310         NPT_List<NPT_NetworkInterface*> if_list;
00311         NPT_CHECK(GetNetworkInterfaces(if_list));
00312 
00313         NPT_List<NPT_NetworkInterface*>::Iterator iface = if_list.GetFirstItem();
00314         while (iface) {
00315             NPT_String ip = (*(*iface)->GetAddresses().GetFirstItem()).GetPrimaryAddress().ToString();
00316             if (ip.Compare("0.0.0.0") && ip.Compare("127.0.0.1")) {
00317                 addresses.Add((*iface)->GetMacAddress().ToString());
00318             }
00319             ++iface;
00320         }
00321 
00322         if_list.Apply(NPT_ObjectDeleter<NPT_NetworkInterface>());
00323         return NPT_SUCCESS;
00324     }
00325 
00326 
00327     static bool IsLocalNetworkAddress(const NPT_IpAddress& address) {
00328         if(address.ToString() == "127.0.0.1") return true;
00329 
00330         NPT_List<NPT_NetworkInterface*> if_list;
00331         NPT_NetworkInterface::GetNetworkInterfaces(if_list);
00332 
00333         NPT_List<NPT_NetworkInterface*>::Iterator iface = if_list.GetFirstItem();
00334         while (iface) {
00335             if((*iface)->IsAddressInNetwork(address)) return true;
00336             ++iface;
00337         }
00338 
00339         if_list.Apply(NPT_ObjectDeleter<NPT_NetworkInterface>());
00340         return false;
00341     }
00342 
00343 private:
00344 
00345     static NPT_Result _GetNetworkInterfaces(NPT_List<NPT_NetworkInterface*>& if_list, 
00346                                             bool only_localhost = false) {
00347         NPT_List<NPT_NetworkInterface*> _if_list;
00348         NPT_CHECK(NPT_NetworkInterface::GetNetworkInterfaces(_if_list));
00349 
00350         NPT_NetworkInterface* iface;
00351         while (NPT_SUCCEEDED(_if_list.PopHead(iface))) {
00352             if (iface->GetAddresses().GetItemCount() == 0) {
00353                 delete iface;
00354                 continue;
00355             }
00356             
00357             NPT_String ip = 
00358                 iface->GetAddresses().GetFirstItem()->GetPrimaryAddress().ToString();
00359             if (ip.Compare("0.0.0.0") && 
00360                 ((!only_localhost && ip.Compare("127.0.0.1")) || (only_localhost && !ip.Compare("127.0.0.1")))) {
00361                 if_list.Add(iface);
00362 
00363                 // add localhost only once
00364                 if (only_localhost) break;
00365             } else {
00366                 delete iface;
00367             }
00368         }
00369 
00370         // cleanup any remaining items in list if we breaked early
00371         _if_list.Apply(NPT_ObjectDeleter<NPT_NetworkInterface>());
00372         return NPT_SUCCESS;
00373     }
00374 };
00375 
00376 #endif /* _PLT_UPNP_HELPER_H_ */
